Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.ziplineproject

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.ziplineproject.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Odometer class keeps track of the robot's position and orientation at all times by counting wheel rotations. It runs in a separate Thread.
    Author:
    Chaoyi Liu
